yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.objects
Interface Behavior<An>

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleLightBehavior, IntellectCore, SensorBehavior
public interface Behavior<An>

Interface for CompositeSceneEntity behavior - change of internal state. Invoked in StageAnimator loop.

Method Summary
 boolean behave(double time, An entity, boolean isVisible)
          Makes it behave.
 

Method Detail

behave

boolean behave(double time,
               An entity,
               boolean isVisible)
Makes it behave.

Parameters:
time - "real world" time to calculate the behavior for.
entity - Entity this behavior should be applied to
isVisible - states, if the entity is currently visible to invoke simpler behavior
Returns:
true, if the underlying entity has been relocated and needs spatial update.
